body: @boykami: There is no part 1. I checked ALL of Oryou's previous works and none of the characters are the same as this one (at first glance, new fans to Oryou's art will have a hard time telling apart but there are obvious distinct fringes among the forehead bangs, hair clips or not, and eye shapes/colors). Ok, let's wait for the TL to this God-tier art.
Waiting for translation this is part two right I think there is a part one of this
GOD DAYUM! ... that Sexy Onee-san Satsuki-nee has returned ..... "AND IT IS GLORIOUS!" Waiting patiently for the English translation.
Fuckton of shota today and now even oryou.
Fucking finally, a new Oryou manga!
